body_html:
I was actually able to get the Official models installed and working properly, although I still need to try to manipulate the training set by taking out subsets to train separate networks. Could I still follow up on here if I am not able to do so? Also, would you have any advice about how to get the official models to work in a Colaboratory Notebook? I have tried running the MNIST model in my Notebook <https://colab.research.google.com/drive/13Gl9l-xnIL4OeNgd-Wqrb2bMcG10NUF1>, but I get ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'official' on the line "from official.mnist import dataset". I have tried uploading all of the scripts in the "official" folder (that includes all the Official Models) to my google drive but this did not help. Thank you.

body:
I was actually able to get the Official models installed and working
properly, although I still need to try to manipulate the training set by
taking out subsets to train separate networks. Could I still follow up on
here if I am not able to do so?

Also, would you have any advice about how to get the official models to
work in a Colaboratory Notebook? I have tried running the MNIST model in my
Notebook
<https://colab.research.google.com/drive/13Gl9l-xnIL4OeNgd-Wqrb2bMcG10NUF1>,
but I get  ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'official' on the line "from
official.mnist import dataset".

I have tried uploading all of the scripts in the "official" folder (that
includes all the Official Models) to my google drive but this did not help.

Thank you.
